name: Hiking the Vietnamese largest desert 1 night 2 days (From Ho Chi Minh, Mui Ne)
description: Hoa Thang desert at Bau Cat-Mui Ne-Binh Thuan is the largest desert in Vietnam. With the total area is about 22km2 and the length stretches about 12km, moreover with the intensely harsh climate condition, limited living beings and plants, terrain of field included in many great sand hills in a row are worth designated to be called the biggest desert in Vietnam. Let’s expericence to go through your feelings of hiking the Vietnamese biggest desert held by Vietnam Motorbike Tours with a lot of different exciting activities  like: camping, having dinner, sand-skiing inside the desert.
